databaseConfig.sql: SELECT BG_YOSAN_SBT.YOSAN_SBT_ID, BG_YOSAN_SBT.YOSAN_SBT_NAME, BG_YOSAN_SBT.RENEW_DATE, BG_YOSAN_SBT.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_YOSAN_SBT.TS FROM BG_YOSAN_SBT
SELECT BG_YOSAN_SBT.YOSAN_SBT_ID, BG_YOSAN_SBT.YOSAN_SBT_NAME, BG_YOSAN_SBT.RENEW_DATE, BG_YOSAN_SBT.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_YOSAN_SBT.TS FROM BG_YOSAN_SBT WHERE BG_YOSAN_SBT.YOSAN_SBT_ID = :YOSAN_SBT_ID
INSERT INTO BG_YOSAN_SBT ( YOSAN_SBT_ID, YOSAN_SBT_NAME, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( :YOSAN_SBT_ID, :YOSAN_SBT_NAME, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE BG_YOSAN_SBT SET YOSAN_SBT_NAME = :YOSAN_SBT_NAME, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE (YOSAN_SBT_ID = :YOSAN_SBT_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
